xt:extension.xt:name: Components Filter

body.p: This type of plugin can be used to remove various toolbar and menu actions or various visual components from an Oxygen standalone installation by modifying its "filter.xml" configuration file. As a default behavior the plugin removes the "Grid" editing mode.
